title: Ep. 36: Questioners - Do You Always Ask Why?
description:
Ep. 36: We're talking about the Four Tendencies Framework, and this week, we focus on the Questioner Tendency, with the help of Christy Fletcher. Want to get in touch? @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft;
podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/36; 774-277-9336.

itunes:subtitle: Do You Always Ask “Why?” Maybe You’re a Questioner.
